text: this is the side of trading that all those fake ass influencers fake influencers don't want you to see I want to walk you through some very specific habits that I adopted in my early trading career back in 2007 that led to a massive change in my outcome for those that don't know I grew up in an area with 2 and a half times the national rate of violent crime fun fact I actually got stabbed in my hand while in high school between classes the reason why I bring that up is not for a Sab story I'm proud of my background it shaped who I am today however it wasn't really that advantageous for making a bunch of money so when I was looking at starting trading it was very focused on changing my circumstance it was more than just making money so I can buy a nice t-shirt or some I was really focused on changing what my lot in life was going to look like so I want to walk you through those habits right now what's up everybody Eric here welcome back to all the outliers and a shout out to the patreon family if what I do helps you out consider signing up in the notes below all right let's take a look at some foundational information on the left-and side these are just some recent news articles about my alma moer High School NFA and I walk through metal detectors every

text: effort so that doesn't necessarily detract me what I mean by that is I still see a chance because I know the majority of these people are average ass people doing doing average ass things and like this quitting so I understand even though the most quit there's a smaller subset in there that are probably trying and still failing so it tells me that this is something that's possible but probably pretty difficult so what does this mean it means that we have to shift our Focus from how much money we're going to make getting enough money so that we could buy a nice car and we need to shift our Focus From the outcome that we want and really emphasize the process we are going to leverage to get there because I cannot tell you how frequently I see Traders say things like oh do you think it's possible to make 20 per year I don't know for you I know for me it's possible but I also know the amount of effort I've put into doing this have you done that so it's impossible for me to rationally say what is possible for you you might be able to blow my returns out of the water which would be awesome the fact of the matter is you have have to figure out how to get yourself through this process and the sooner you accept the fact that the only thing you can control in the markets

text: it how to do it to do it well to go into detail to do the hard things this is not going to be for you because you are the only person that holds yourself accountable so unless you have astronomically high standards which you should you're probably going to accept a lesser output which doesn't bode well in trading how do we do this simple tracking this is the ultimate Way we can objectively review our performance I can't tell you how many times traders that I talk to they say oh I I think I'm doing well or I don't think I lost that much but they don't know they don't even look and it's because their ego doesn't want to be confronted with the reality that they might suck at this and that the thing that they've been doing for 5 years might not be working as well as they think it might and they don't want to address it the sooner you throw that out and you abolish your ego and you instead value truth the sooner you can hold yourself to the correct standard and start doing the things to get you closer to your objective as compared to hiding like a ostrich with your head in the sand which gets you exactly nowhere okay think we got that point done the easy route doesn't exist that is just a fact of trading so on Reddit which I love checking out because it's a great

text: trading I would focus far more of my time on things that take one unit of effort and give me 10 units of output as compared to the inverse and the example I gave you earlier is whether using 26 or 27 days on your macd indicator will make or break you do you think that that that one day difference in your macd indicator is a 10x activity or 1X activity probably a 1x my point there is I'm not saying that that 1 day difference doesn't have any impact at all but that's probably not going to lead you to a gross output why do I care so much about the details it's for this right here if we take a look at this account this is looking at a 15 return over 20 years and I think we're starting with 150,000 right there if you earn that return you're going to make about 2.5 million if you make just 1 above that in your return you are now at 2.9 million half a million dollars more on 1 this is exactly why The Details Matter this is why you have to emphasize the entire process and then your capacity to track your progress in that process none of this is easy however these undoubtedly are nine of the habits that took me from my starting point of getting shanked in my hand in high school to being a multi-millionaire in my early 30s like subscribe be an
